summary: This bill, S. 1986, aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The core of the bill extends the temporary increase in the limitation on the cover-over of distilled spirits taxes to Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands. Specifically, it changes the date cited in Section 7652(f)(1) to extend the policy, maintaining the increased tax revenues allocated to these territories. The amendment will apply to distilled spirits brought into the United States after December 31, 2021.
